data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Kvemo Kartli, Georgia to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kvemo Kartli, Georgia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 7,026 believers in the state of Kvemo Kartli the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary: On average, 70 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Kvemo Kartli, Georgia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kvemo Kartli, Georgia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Kvemo Kartli, Georgia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tajik people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, make the 7,026 believers in Kvemo Kartli to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 511,074 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Kvemo Kartli, Georgia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Kvemo Kartli, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

location.name: Kvemo Kartli
location.people_groups_list: Kazakh, Tatar, Yazidi, Estonian, Jew, Georgian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kazakh (1,800), Tatar (2,800), Yazidi (12,000), Estonian (1,600), Jew, Georgian (1,700)
